motivi-per-diventare-speaker.brief: Perché non fare un ulteriore passo in avanti e diventare uno speaker?
motivi-per-diventare-speaker.content:
Chi studia o lavora nell’ambito dell’IT sa bene quanto la partecipazione agli eventi tenuti dalle aziende o dalle community sia fondamentale per tenere il passo con quello che è un mondo in perenne evoluzione.

Da una parte anche una semplice partecipazione permette di conoscere nuove idee, venire a conoscenza di storie di successo, ma anche di meno piacevoli, ma non per questo meno costruttivi, fallimenti. Ogni testimonianza permette di evitare passi falsi, scoprire nuove tecnologie e comprenderne il funzionamento o togliersi quel dubbio che spesso affligge per giorni o settimane.

Oltre a questo c’è il networking: conoscere nuove persone, nuove aziende, nuove realtà è sempre un’esperienza che ci arricchisce, sia sul piano personale che professionale.

Perché non fare dunque un ulteriore passo in avanti e diventare uno speaker?

Per i più timidi è giusto evidenziare quanto portare una propria “talk” permetta di prendere dimestichezza con il “public speaking” e vincere i propri timori. Tutti hanno un punto di vista che merita di essere esposto, un’esperienza da raccontare o un’idea da condividere quindi perché non mettersi in gioco?

Se invece il coraggio non manca è necessario ricordare quanto raccontare la propria esperienza e dimostrare le proprie competenze possano giovare alla propria carriera.

Il ritorno di immagine e la pubblicità derivanti dall’esposizione della propria talk si riveleranno infatti elementi costruttivi, sia che si parli a nome della propria azienda o semplicemente si cerchi un modo per mettersi sotto i riflettori e mostrare di cosa si è capaci.

Oltre a questi vantaggi non bisogna dimenticare che quello che accomuna chi partecipa, qualsiasi sia la veste, a questi eventi sono interesse e passione. Se questi ingredienti non mancano o, al contrario, sentite il bisogno di ritrovarli, partecipare ad un evento è quello che fa per voi.

Articolo pubblicato su Medium da GDG Trento
motivi-per-diventare-speaker.title: Motivi per partecipare ed essere speaker alla DevFest

11.description: In questa sessione di live coding realizzeremo un semplice progetto Angular con l’integrazione di NGRX, lo state manager reattivo più utilizzato in ambito enterprise che si ispira al famoso pattern Redux. Una breve sessione in cui, non solo configureremo lo store, creeremo reducer, effects e selettori, ma parleremo anche di struttura moduli, organizzazione progetti enterprise, manutenzione e scalabilità del codice.
11.title: State management in Angular e NGRX (live-coding)

12.description: Micro-frontends sono un nuovo trend nelle architetture Frontend. Questa architettura, basata sui principi dei microservizi, offre molteplici benefici quando usata su progetti medio-grandi con diversi team che lavorano sullo stesso prodotto.
12.title: Micro-Frontends Decisions Framework

13.description: What is coaching, simple tools that can be applied in daily life
13.title: Coaching boosts your daily life

14.description: Lo studio delle keyword e dell'intento di ricerca ci permette di analizzare una nicchia, il pubblico di riferimento e i contenuti da creare per sviluppare un sito web che permetta a 'domanda' e 'offerta' di incontrarsi.
14.title: Come trovare il Principe Azzurro: un esempio di keyword research a lieto fine

ElisaContessotto.bio: Mi occupo dell’area formazione di SEOZoom. Tra un caffè e un Prosecco ho orientato i miei interessi verso la Business Intelligence e la Keyword Research coniugando l'approccio creativo a quello analitico.
ElisaContessotto.name: Elisa Contessotto
ElisaContessotto.title: Formatrice, SEOZoom

GiuliaVillirilli.bio: I am Giulia Villirilli, a certified coach for leadership and transformation. I help my clients break through their plateau and be a living inspiration. I have an international business background (MBA) and 9+ years of experience living and working abroad. I worked as Account Manager of one of the major players in the Automotive Industry, with focus on the German market, and had additional professional experiences related to international trade fairs, public speaking and marketing. My background as an expat and my willingness to learn and improve serve me well in my profession as a coach, as they facilitate the understanding of different perspectives. The topics I coach the most are: leadership, self-development, courage, decision making and resilience. As a certified professional coach, I serve the client as a reliable partner in the coaching journey: from establishing trust, to developing awareness and moving to action
GiuliaVillirilli.name: Giulia Villirilli
GiuliaVillirilli.shortBio: Certified coach for leadership and transformation
GiuliaVillirilli.title: Certified coach for leadership and transformation

LucaMezzalira.bio: Being associated with the industry since 2004, I have lent my expertise predominantly in the solution architecture field. As a Vice President of Architecture at DAZN—a cloud-based sports video platform that offers content to a sizeable user base, for which I administer various OTT-centric issues involving governance, scalability and resilience. Being associated with DAZN, I have gained accolades for revolutionising the scalability of frontend architectures with micro-frontends, from increasing the efficiency of workflows, to delivering quality in products. My colleagues know me as an excellent communicator who believes in using an interactive approach for understanding and solving problems of varied scopes. My core industry knowledge has been instrumental in resolving complex architectural and integration challenges. I have worked towards shaping the evolution of our platform across various targets from Web, TV and mobiles to desktops, set-top boxes and embedded devices. Working within the scopes of a plethora of technical roles such as tech lead, solutions architect and CTO, I have developed a precise understanding of various technicalities which has helped me in maximizing value of my company and products in my current leadership roles
LucaMezzalira.name: Luca Mezzalira
LucaMezzalira.shortBio: VP of Architecture at DAZN | Google Developer Expert | O'Reilly author | International Speaker
LucaMezzalira.title: VP of Architecture at DAZN | Google Developer Expert | O'Reilly author | International Speaker

FabioBiondi.bio: Fabio Biondi, Microsoft MVP e Google Developer Expert in web technologies con specializzazione in Angular, è uno sviluppatore freelance con più di 15 anni di esperienza nella creazione di applicazioni web enterprise. Speaker in numerosi eventi front-end, ha inoltre fondato diverse community italiane che si occupano di Javascript, Angular e React (~ 20000 membri). Attualmente si occupa di formazione e consulenza su Javascript, Typescript, Angular, React, Redux, NGRX e RxJS.
FabioBiondi.name: Fabio Biondi
FabioBiondi.shortBio: Microsoft MVP | Google Expert in Web Technologies & Angular

GiulioRoggero.bio: Sono fortunato perché il mio lavoro e la mia passione coincidono! Scrivere codice, disegnare Architetture Software e “mettere in produzione” sistemi informatici complessi sono le attività che prediligo. In 20 anni di professione ho messo le mani in diversi contesti: dalla migrazione di 3 milioni di righe di codice da SCO Unix a Linux, alle architetture a microservizi su cluster kubernetes. Ho la fortuna di lavorare con i fortissimi team di Mia-Platform e Intré con i quali condivido successi e fatiche nel ruolo di CTO per la prima e di Strategist per la seconda; e visto che il codice da solo non basta, con i coach di Agile Reloaded abbiamo creato una bella realtà per aiutare le aziende a lavorare al meglio.
GiulioRoggero.name: Giulio Roggero

AliceMarmieri.bio: Da oltre 10 anni mi occupo di Online Marketing e Innovazione. Dopo numerosi anni come Marketing Manager in aziende multinazionali del calibro di Google e Luxottica ho deciso di intraprendere la mia avventura imprenditoriale e fondare Marte Digital, azienda di consulenza e formazione in ambito digitale, certificata Google Digital Trainer e partner del Corriere Economia. Le mie esperienze come manager in azienda, imprenditrice e consulente mi hanno insegnato l'importanza di saper comunicare il proprio valore in modo efficace a clienti, manager e la propria audience. Per questo motivo dal 2017 affianco imprenditori, leader d'azienda e professionisti a creare il proprio Personal Brand per diventare dei leader nel proprio settore. La mia missione è aiutare professionisti straordinari a comunicare il proprio valore, costruire la propria autorità e attrarre il cliente ideale grazie al Personal Branding.
AliceMarmieri.name: Alice Marmieri
AliceMarmieri.title: Consulente Personal Branding & LinkedIn Expert

DiegoGosmar.bio: Successful international speaker, Diego Gosmar is a manager with over 20 years of experience in the ICT sector and a writer with passion for innovation. He is author of the new book “Machine Learning - The sixth chakra of Artificial Intelligence” Published on August 2020 - ISBN: 979-8674459958. In 2010 Diego and his partners were rewarded for having founded Xenialab: best innovative start-up at the I3P incubator of the Turin Polytechnic University. Diego has led the international expansion of the XCALLYTM omni-channel software solution, reaching over 50 countries worldwide, managing partners and hundreds of customers scattered from Singapore to the Middle East, Europe, South Africa, the United States, Brazil and others. Since December 2019 Xenialab has become part of the INGO Spa group and Diego has been focusing on the growth of international operations. Diego's experience is linked to Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (AI) with particular attention to speech analysis, sentiment analysis and customer service applications through advanced forecasting and IVR models.
DiegoGosmar.name: Diego Gosmar
DiegoGosmar.title: VP International Operations - INGO Spa

Certifications: AWS Solutions Architect, Azure Solution Architect Expert, Associate GOOGLE CLOUD Associate Engineer , Professional Data Engineer, Professional Cloud Architect and Professional Cloud Developer, ORACLE Database Administrator Neo4j Certification. Passionate about Machine Learning and Big Data. Since 2011, Google Developer Group GDG ROMA Founder and co-Leader. With our help, many people managed to improve their professional life, to get a better job, and to gain more self-confidence and motivation. I am really proud of it and I am grateful to Google for giving me this opportunity. Application and System Engineer in the International SW Development Lab of IBM in Italy. Professor of Relational Database Design at the University La Sapienza of Rome. Temporary manager (IT and Finance) in the Daimler (Mercedes) Outsourcing Company; Part in international task forces for defining valuation and transfer strategies of all the assets of big data centers (IBM Mainframes). International Software Projects and Big experience in Databases and Data/System Integration

She has been involved in the tech industry for over 10 years, working as a full-stack developer and getting involved with education projects teaching coding in cities like New York and Buenos Aires. She has been recognized as a Google Developer Expert and a Woman Techmakers Ambassador, as a mentor she helped startups participating in accelerator programs like Google Launchpad and the World Food Programme by the United Nations. Currently, she is a web developer advocate for Samsung Internet at Samsung Research Institute UK where the team contributes to open source projects, build demos and participate in conferences getting the word out about advanced web features helping web developers to create great and more inclusive web apps.

Aiuto le persone a lavorare più felicemente: sono una consulente per la Digital Transformation e una community manager, ciecamente convinta che le persone appassionate lavorino meglio e raggiungano risultati migliori. Sono la fondatrice e coordinatrice di PUG Romagna e devRomagna, due community di sviluppatori per sviluppatori, create con l’obiettivo di diffondere le buone pratiche e condividere conoscenza.

I’m also a keen writer as I love to share my learnings and experiences with others.

KarenHuaulme.bio: As a Developer Advocate at MongoDB, Karen Huaulmé (pronounced “You-Old-Maid” - but with no d’s) collaborates with developers to unleash their creativity across all aspects of data and technology. Leveraging her past experience as a Solutions Architect for some of MongoDB’s most demanding customers, Karen loves to trigger that “aha” moment in the minds of developers - when they recognize a better path to simplify, enhance, and accelerate their projects in ways they never thought possible. Prior to MongoDB, Karen spent most of her career working with video game developers as a Solutions Architect and Integration Engineer at Nvidia, Amazon, and Twitch. In her free time, Karen embarrasses her 2 kids, spoils her dog, and feeds her addiction to adventure travel - not necessarily in that order.
KarenHuaulme.name: Karen Huaulme
KarenHuaulme.title: Principal Developer Advocate, MongoDB

FrancescoSciuti.bio: A talented and accomplished programmer extremely competent after several years of experience in enterprise programming , high skilled in web development (frontend and backend) and in team project management. I have a keen interest in new technologies and in IT development and I’m always upgrading and evaluating my knowledge and skills to stay at the cutting-edge of web development. My outstanding verbal and written communication skills let me involved in lots of meetings, workshop and courses both in Sicily and in Italy as a speaker and tech event organizer. Focused on continual professional and technological improvement: books, courses, articles, forums and regular attender of tech events where I can meet new and interesting people with which exchange as much as possible ideas and technical knowledge. I want to put myself in challenges both in the personal and professional side and this is way I’m involved ,as an active contributor, in many Italian communities (Angular ,React, Javascript ,GDG, PUG, etc…) and I contribute as a counselor to CoderDojo Foundation (Computational youth learning). I’ve worked for a long time as a employee and then as a freelancer, but nowadays I has my own company: Acadevmy – Software Factory, founded with my friends Andrea and Salvo.
FrancescoSciuti.name: Francesco Sciuti
FrancescoSciuti.title: Microsoft MVP & CEO @ Acadevmy srl

GDG Coimbra organizer and Kotlin evangelist, he also has a huge passion for travel, photography, space and the occasional run.

I also frequently speak at tech conferences and mentor product teams both independently as well as a Google for Startups mentor.

FaizMalkani.title: Agrahyah Technologies

He founded Deep Learning Italia the biggest e-learning platform on Artificial Intelligence area in the Italian language. He was one of the technical writers for the Artificial Intelligence Italian white paper. In January 2018 he founded Icaro Artificial Intelligence solution a Fintech company with a focus on Deep Learning models for Asset Allocation.

In 2017 I had a motorcycle accident and I lost a foot, from there with great difficulty I started a path that brought me to the national podiums of Paralympic athletics.

FrancescoFullone.bio: I'm Francesco Fullone business designer, consultant, and mentor and investor in technology companies with a focus on sustainability or social impact. I help companies (in any stage) to better define their business propositions and to create options to validate them. I also advise companies to better organize themselves in order to reach their goals. I founded, and I contribute to Apropos, a company which helps communities, companies, and local groups to organize conference and workshops. If you attended an international conference about web technologies in Italy, you met me as a speaker, organizer, or attendee. I'm the president of the GrUSP, a no-profit association that encourages good practices in web development since 2002. I also founded companies such as Flowing (previously known as Ideato), where I contributed to its growth for more than ten years creating an innovative and quality reference for the development agencies in Italy.
FrancescoFullone.name: Francesco Fullone
FrancescoFullone.shortBio: consultant, entrepreneur, community leader and advisor
FrancescoFullone.title: consultant, entrepreneur, community leader and advisor

MichelMurabito.bio: Deputy CTO by day, Developer in the soul, Superhero wannabe by night. Attualmente ricopre la carica di Deputy Chief Technical Officer in Liscor S.p.A, classe 1986 nato a Torino e cresciuto in Sicilia, inizia a scrivere software per gioco a 12 anni. Primo lavoro a 18 anni come Sviluppatore Software, da lì inizia ad esplorare vari contesti e nuove opportunità di crescita professionale. Lavora come dipendente e come libero professionista collaborando ad alcuni progetti tecnologici per la Regione Siciliana e il MiBACT. Contribuisce alla creazione di numerose startup digital e di prodotti innovativi per grossi clienti internazionali. Tra il 2015 e il 2017 si occupa di relazioni con gli sviluppatori, nel team di Developer Relations per una grossa multinazionale Americana. Tra le più grandi passioni quella di raccontare le nuove tecnologie e come gli sviluppatori possono aiutare a creare prodotti migliori; nel triennio 2017/2019 ha partecipato come speaker a 80 eventi e conferenze in Italia ed Europa.
MichelMurabito.name: Michel Murabito
MichelMurabito.title: Deputy CTO @Liscor (Gruppo @Lutech)

FabrizioWaldner.bio: Recently joined Google as Site Reliability Engineer after 5 years as Unix System Administrator in the financial sector.
FabrizioWaldner.name: Fabrizio Waldner
FabrizioWaldner.title: Google, Site Reliability Engineer

NavSingh.bio: He is a professional Android developer. Apart from his day to day job, He spend his time to learn new technologies/frameworks. He is also an Organizer at GDG-Montreal. He also work as Android instructor at Caster.io and mentor at Udacity. During his free he loves to watch Netflix, or you can find him at Gym.
NavSingh.name: Nav Singh
NavSingh.title: Android developer at Manulife

GiovannaDeVincenzo.bio: Data scientist di Infocamere, cofounder di R-Ladies Bari e data visualization lover. Dopo la laurea in Economia, ha frequentato un Master in Data Science e ha scoperto la sua vera passione: raccontare i dati. Specializzata in R, data analytics e data visualization, ha ottenuto di recente la certificazione come Tableau Desktop Specialist. Ama la tecnologia, l'innovazione e la tecno inclusione. Nel 2018 ha fondato la community delle R-Ladies Bari, un gruppo locale che si rifà a RLadies Global, un’organizzazione internazionale non-profit il cui scopo è di promuovere diversità ed equità di genere nella comunità di utenti di R. Questo il suo credo: limiti e cliché non esistono se c'è passione e motivazione in quel che si fa
GiovannaDeVincenzo.name: Giovanna de Vincenzo
GiovannaDeVincenzo.title: Data Scientist @InfoCamere, Founder R-Ladies Bari

SaraIacozza.bio: Dottorata in Neuroscienze e psicologia cognitiva, ora mi occupo di alfabetizzazione dati e consulenza. La mia missione è supportare coloro che si avvicinano al mondo dei dati venendo da settori non tradizionalmente legati ad essi.
SaraIacozza.name: Sara Iacozza
SaraIacozza.title: Data advocate

ParvaneShafiei.bio: Parvaneh is a senior Data scientist in EY with more than 5 years of experience in applying Advanced Analytics & Machine Learning for business problems & identifying the best practices tailored for each client.
ParvaneShafiei.name: Parvane Shafiei
ParvaneShafiei.title: Data scientist, Founder R-Ladies Milano

MarcoGomiero.bio: I'm working as Uniwhere Tech Lead, where I manage the end-to-end development of a platform with half a million users. I'm a Kotlin lover with a Computer Engineering degree, I have experience with native Android and native iOS development, as well as cross-platform development with React Native, Flutter and Kotlin Multiplatform. In my spare time I write and maintain open source code, I share my dev experience by speaking at confs and organizing events with the Google Developer Group Venezia and I play basketball.
MarcoGomiero.name: Marco Gomiero
MarcoGomiero.title: Tech Lead @ Uniwhere

GianSegato.bio: Gianluca Segato is the CEO and founder of Uniwhere, an app that helps students go through college more effectively thanks to data aggregation. He graduated in Economics and he's skilled in machine learning, growth engineering and venture investment. His company has been included among the top 100 startups in Berlin and has been featured in several international media outlets, from SkyNews24 to The Huffington Post.
GianSegato.name: Gian Segato
GianSegato.title: Uniwhere founder

Lynn Langit.bio: Cloud Architect working with remote dev teams world-wide to build cloud solutions. Author of 30 LinkedIn Learning Cloud/Data courses with over 4 million student views. https://www.linkedin.com/learning/instructors/lynn-langit

Lynn Langit.shortBio: CEO Lynn Langit Consulting LLC - Google Developer Expert Cloud - AWS Community Hero - Microsoft Regional Director

NadiaBenedetti.bio: Advanced Trainer in Ludo-pedagogia, Facilitatrice Serious Play e Game Thinking Coach, sono specializzata nel migliorare la performance individuale e di squadra attraverso le dinamiche del gioco. In particolare costruisco percorsi coinvolgenti che invitano i partecipanti a mettersi in azione, esercitare le soft skills e sperimentare comportamenti più efficaci per gestire il cambiamento.
NadiaBenedetti.name: Nadia Benedetti
NadiaBenedetti.shortBio: Playnbe Founder -Change in action in a playful way
NadiaBenedetti.title: Playnbe Founder -Change in action in a playful way

MariaStimolo.bio: Le parole sono importanti, saperle comunicare ancora di più. Durante gli anni universitari mi chiedevo come avrei potuto unire gli studi umanistici, la passione per la scrittura e la curiosità verso il settore della comunicazione utilizzando i nuovi media. Tutto ciò ha portato ad avvicinarmi al mondo della comunicazione digitale. Mi sono accorta concretamente di quanto una buona strategia di digital marketing si fondi sulla consapevolezza della forza delle parole, così mi sono concentrata soprattutto sul Content Marketing e sulle tematiche inerenti al Personal Branding . Sono stata community manager GDGCatania e WTM Ambassador e formatrice nelle attività del Coderdojo Etneo. Da due anni mi occupo di content marketing e di strategie digitali per Crm4, un'azienda di sviluppo software.
MariaStimolo.name: Maria Stimolo
MariaStimolo.title: Content marketing, comunicazione digitale
